byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and MAGGIE HABERMAN

abstract: Presidential candidate Hillary Clinton seizes on lewd comments by Donald Trump in order to appeal for solidarity among female voters; Trump made degrading comment about Clinton's use of bathroom during Democratic debate and used vulgar sexual language to describe her defeat by Pres Obama in 2008.
lead_paragraph: While the other Republican candidates tread carefully to avoid antagonizing Mr. Trump’s supporters, for Mrs. Clinton, hitting hard appears relatively risk-free.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Seizes on Donald Trump’s Remarks to Galvanize Women
headline.print_headline: Clinton Turns Trump’s Taunts Into Potent Lure

snippet: While the other Republican candidates tread carefully to avoid antagonizing Mr. Trump’s supporters, for Mrs. Clinton, hitting hard appears relatively risk-free.
